content: आपोशानः <ab>N.</ab> of a kind of prayer or formula repeated before and after eating (the formulas being respectively अमृतोपस्तरणमसि स्वाहा and अमृतापिधानमसि स्वाहा); आपोशानक्रियापूर्वं सत्कृतान्नमकुत्सयन् <ls>Y. 1. 31</ls>, <ls n="Y. 1.">106.</ls> --नं The act of making an उपस्तरण (seat) and अपिधान (covering) for the food eaten.
